text: "It's a Heartache" is a song recorded by Welsh singer Bonnie Tyler for her second studio album, Natural Force (1978). The song was recorded in the same year by Juice Newton as a standalone single. Tyler's version received positive reviews from music critics. The song reached number three in the United States and number four in the United Kingdom. Tyler's version is one of the best- selling singles of all time. ==References== Category:1977 songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs Category:Juice Newton songs Category:Rod Stewart songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: It's a Heartache
